section.title: Description
section.p: Identifies the SCI Coordinators who are providing or have provided Spinal Cord Injury - related services to the Veteran
Contains all the Coordinator SCI that provoded services for the veteran

stentry.p: Indicates whether the veteran is within an SCI Network (SCI networks across the country 22 currently ) Indicates whether the veteran is within an SCI Network (SCI networks across the country 22 currently )

Identifies the current and historic SCI Coordinator/s providing services for the veteran Identifies the SCI Coordinators who are providing or have provided Spinal Cord Injury - related services to the Veteran
